CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Cargo Ships relative to Delivery Vans?
SRP.A: Cargo Ships is {above} Delivery Vans in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total fuel consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Delivery Vans}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total fuel consumption?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Cargo Ships}.

VE.Q: What is Cargo Ships's Fuel Consumption in 1995?
VE.A: Cargo Ships's fuel consumption in 1995 is {4.71} L/100km.

VE.Q: What is Cargo Ships's Fuel Consumption in 1991?
VE.A: Cargo Ships's fuel consumption in 1991 is {8.55} L/100km.

VE.Q: What is Cargo Ships's Fuel Consumption in 2002?
VE.A: Cargo Ships's fuel consumption in 2002 is {0.74} L/100km.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Fuel Consumption in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum fuel consumption is {0.74} L/100km.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Fuel Consumption in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum fuel consumption is {8.55} L/100km.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Fuel Consumption level recorded for Cargo Ships?
EVJ.A: Cargo Ships reached approximately {8.55} L/100km in {1991}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Fuel Consumption level recorded for Cargo Ships?
EVJ.A: Cargo Ships's lowest recorded level is approximately {0.74} L/100km in {2002}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Fuel Consumption?
SC.A: The average total fuel consumption is {10.36} L/100km.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Fuel Consumption exceed 13.29 L/100km? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Fuel Consumption go below 9.71 L/100km? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 2001, did the total Fuel Consumption experience a larger or smaller change than between 1997 and 1998?
NC.A: The change in total fuel consumption between 1993 and 2001 was {larger} than between 1997 and 1998.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 1999, did the total Fuel Consumption experience a larger or smaller change than between 1996 and 2001?
NC.A: The change in total fuel consumption between 1997 and 1999 was {smaller} than between 1996 and 2001.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2000, did the total Fuel Consumption experience a larger or smaller change than between 1998 and 1999?
NC.A: The change in total fuel consumption between 1998 and 2000 was {smaller} than between 1998 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 1998, was the average total Fuel Consumption higher or lower than between 2000 and 2002?
NC.A: The average total fuel consumption between 1989 and 1998 was {higher} than between 2000 and 2002.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Delivery Vans} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Cargo Ships, Delivery Vans}.
